entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 3:46 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.3°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
